Product Details: {'Color': 'White', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding', 'Material': 'Pearl', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 5.51 x 1.69 inches; 4.59 Ounces'}
Review Text: I love this very much. The colors and the beads are amazing ! It did lose one bead when I first got it so that wasn’t nice but I can put it back on sometime. It is very heavy so it slides a lot and is heavy on the head. I get headaches from heavy things so I just have to wear it for special things. I love it very much.
Review Title: Very  beautiful.
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
Qiray
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'}
I really enjoyed having something this pretty to put in my hair. You get two of each color, and they are very pretty. I don’t have a lot of hair so they were a bit lose on me. With the pearls on them, they really don’t wrap around too many times and look the same. My daughter put them around her bun in her hair. This accentuated the beauty of the hairpiece, and it worked really well-just an idea for these beautiful hair accessories. They are prettier than the pictures. I’ll be interested to see how long they stay together so I’ll put an update later on how well they last. Very pleased with this product so far, but they are not for people with thin hair.
Really beautifully made

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** Enjoys aesthetically pleasing hair accessories that enhance beauty, particularly those with unique designs or embellishments such as pearls and rhinestones. 
- **User Engagement:** Demonstrates a positive initial experience with products, showing an interest in durability, while also indicating a willingness to provide future updates on performance.
- **Performance Consideration:** Notably attentive to product weight and comfort, as she has experienced discomfort from heavy accessories that cause headaches, leading to selective use for special occasions. 
- **Hair Type Consideration:** Acknowledges specific needs based on her hair type, noting that some products may be less ideal for thin hair. Seeks versatile uses for accessories, evidenced by using items in different styles (e.g., buns).
- **Color Variety:** Appreciates products that come in multiple colors, emphasizing a desire for personalization and variety in selections.
- **Family Orientation:** Engages in shared use of products with family, highlighting a focus on multifunctionality and broad appeal, particularly with her daughter.

Overall, the user values beauty, functionality, and shared experiences in hair accessory purchases, preferring products that balance aesthetics with practicality while also considering comfort and usability in various settings.
